author: bodewig
msg: enable <javac>'s source switch for fork mode as well.

author: bodewig
msg: Make sure the class passed into Project.addTaskDefinition is suitable
for a task, that is it is public, non-abstract, has a no-arg
constructor and a public no-arg execute method.

author: bodewig
msg: one more JDK 1.1 fix - testcase will fail as touch with and without
argument will result in the same file modification time.
